"""
Guest with sensitivities asks about dye-free, fragrance-free bath mats and requests timing details.

ROLES: user (guest with textile allergies), assistant (agent confirming certifications and delivery window)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
null
```
"""

system:
Registry: sandbar_keys_resort_ki
Property: Sandbar Keys Resort
Location: 210 Ocean Reef Rd, Key Largo, FL 33037
Local Timezone: America/New_York

Bath Linen Specs
- Bath Mat: 55×85 cm | 800 GSM | 100% cotton
- Processing: fragrance-free detergents; dye-free textiles
- Certification: OEKO-TEX Standard 100; REACH compliant
- Non-slip: TPU micro-grip lattice
- Delivery Window: 07:30–21:30

Other House Facts
• Outdoor rinse stations near pool
• Beach towels on Level P kiosk
• Reef-safe amenities note in rooms

user:
Are your bath mats dye-free and fragrance-free? I’m sensitive to additives.

assistant channel=analysis:
Answer directly from Bath Linen Specs. Include certification.

assistant channel=final:
Yes—our bath mats use dye-free textiles and are processed with fragrance-free detergents. They’re OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified and REACH compliant.

user:
What’s the delivery window if I need an extra one?

assistant channel=analysis:
State 07:30–21:30.

assistant channel=final:
We deliver between 07:30 and 21:30.

user:
The reef-safe note in the room was interesting.

assistant channel=analysis:
Short friendly chitchat.

assistant channel=final:
We want to make island stays easy on the water.

user:
Do you offer night snorkeling tours?

assistant channel=analysis:
Not in system; use [ATTENTION].

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Noted. Examining available information.
